DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect Tai chi Fibromyalgia
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Tai Chi Treating Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: 40 year age old meeting classification FM per 1990 ACR criterion approval healthcare provider participation practice Tai chi within past 6 month exercise > 30 min three time weekly past 3 month could independently ambulate without assistive device BPI pain severity interference score less 5 plan elective surgery study period actively involved healthrelated litigation unwilling keep treatments/medications steady throughout study period
